column1: Pass from Down Brighton Slow to DownBrighton Fast
column2: Pass or arrive Battersea Park on Up BrightonSlow towards Victoria

column1: Cross from Up Fast to Up Slow
column2: Pass Battersea Pier Jn on Down Fast

column1: Pass Battersea Pier Jn on Down Fast
column2: Cross from Up Fast to Up Slow

column1: Cross from Brighton Reversible to Down Fast
column2: Pass Battersea Pier Junction on Up Fast

column1: Pass Battersea Pier Junction on Up Fast
column2: Cross from Brighton Reversible to Down Fast

column1: Pass or depart Pouparts Junction to anyBrighton line from the Down Battersea (DBA)Line
column2: Pass Pouparts Junction towards the UpBattersea (UBA) Line

column1: Pass or depart Pouparts Junction from the UpBrighton Slow (UBS) Line to any Up Line
column2: Pass or depart Pouparts Junction to the UpBrighton Slow (UBS) Line in the Down(reversible) direction

column1: Pass or depart Pouparts Junction from any UpLine to the Up Battersea (UBA) Line
column2: Pass or depart Pouparts Junction on the UpBrighton Fast (UBF) Line

column1: A train exceeding 552m/86SLU in length on the Down Battersea will foul TVS63 or TVS65 when standing atTVC575 signal.Therefore, junction margins must be based on trains’ departure time at Pouparts Junction
Pass/arrive from Up Brighton Slow intoplatform 16 or pass/depart fromplatform 17 to Down Brighton Slow
column2: Pass/arrive into platform 15 fromDown Brighton Slow or DownBrighton Fast

column1: Arrive or pass platform 15 from Up BrightonSlow (UBS) Line in Down (reversible) direction
column2: Depart platform 14 to the Up Brighton Slow (UBS)Line in the Up direction

column1: Depart from Platform 15 to Down Slow
column2: Arrive into Platform 16 from Up Slow

column1: Passenger trains formed of more than 9-cars or 171 meters should not be planned to stop at Platform 16 as this isan 8 car platform and therefore would foul Falcon Junction preventing departures from Platform 15 to the DownBrighton Slow
